description: Multifunctional Discord bot for your server

music.title: Music
music.description: Easy to use music will definitely not let you get bored and will be a great replacement for other music bots

utils.title: Utilities
utils.description: Use the utilities built into the bot to quickly and conveniently perform various tasks and get the information you need

auto-moderation.title: Moderation
auto-moderation.description: Set up auto-moderation once and relax. She will punish all violators if you are busy!

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Customize everything you want, from prefix to participant greetings and farewells
